pageContext.claim: Question: "You woudln't benefit from your tax plan?" Trump: "No, I don't benefit. I don't benefit. In fact, very, very strongly, as you see, I think there's very little benefit for people of wealth.‚Äù
pageContext.analysis: Trump falsely claims he would get no benefit from a tax plan that eliminates the alternative minimum tax (AMT). His 2005 tax return showed AMT added $31 million to his tax bill.
